participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is wise and reflective, with a playful spirit despite her age. She enjoys sharing stories from the past.
participant_1.background: i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Jack is hardworking and down-to-earth, with a love for nature and music. He finds joy in simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to listen to rock music while working. i've three arabian horses.
